hero.title: Turn every Instagram story into a signature performance
hero.description: With the commercial Insta-Webyar theme, BVazir typography, AI copywriting, and cinematic 3D scenes, every post feels couture across light and dark.

Full-stack SSR on Cloudflare Workers for millisecond TTFB.

pricing.title: Administrative plans
pricing.subtitle: Seven to eight tiers built for Persian Instagram operations, from IRR 3M to 25M per month.
pricing.description: Every plan ships with SSR, LazyLoading, bilingual support, and secure storage.
pricing.note: Prices are listed in Iranian Toman. Foreign currency billing is available on request.

highlights.title: Royal design
highlights.description: Color tokens inspired by Persian mosaics with luminous dark mode.

highlights.title: Edge delivery
highlights.description: Edge SSR keeps median page response around 140ms worldwide.

highlights.title: Dedicated success
highlights.description: Persian-speaking success partners support every plan.

items.question: Is SSR and LazyLoading enabled by default?
items.answer: Yes. Insta-Webyar is rendered via SSR and every heavy section hydrates through adaptive LazyLoading.

items.question: Can we pay in foreign currency?
items.answer: International teams can receive invoices in USD or EUR while the dashboard shows local Toman values.

items.question: Do you integrate with CRM platforms?
items.answer: Absolutely. Connect HubSpot, Salesforce, RaastCRM, and more through our prebuilt bridges.
